item.description:
What does an organized house look like? How did it get that way? How does it stay that way? What consitutes "clutter" anyway?

Next Tuesday our guest will be Sandra Tollos. She's not a professional organizer, or ADD coach, or reformed messie. She's just a naturally organized person.

Guess what? Sandra says she doesn't make her bed every day and that she has some piles of stuff - but she knows exactly where every single thing is in her house. She tosses magazines and files receipts. She gets rid of clothes she she no longer wears.

How did she get this way? What's she doing that we're not? Come join us and hear the "confessions of a naturally organized woman".

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Please enter through Homer Street door...

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Confessions of a Naturally Organized Woman
